exam.question: They took ________ measures to prevent poisonous gases from escaping.

answer.explain: take effective measure： 采取有效措施。句意： 他们采取了有效措施来防止有毒气体泄漏。fruitful： 多产的， 富有成效的； beneficial： 有益的， 有利的； valid： 有效的。

sentences.sContent: The cheaper drugs are just as effective in treating arthritis.
sentences.sCn: 较便宜的药品对治疗关节炎同样有效。

sentences.sContent: the painting’s highly effective use of colour
sentences.sCn: 绘画中得心应手的色彩运用

sentences.sContent: Training is often much less effective than expected.
sentences.sCn: 训练的效果往往远低于预期。

sentences.sContent: the most effective ways of reducing inner city congestion
sentences.sCn: 减少旧城区交通拥挤最有效的办法

sentences.sContent: ...Teamwork is most effective when team members share the same culture...
...Decentralisation of authority was also found to be more effective in military operations...
...There is continuing debate as to how effective sunscreen is in reducing melanomas the evidence is weaker than it is for preventing other types of skin cancer...
...I see way fewer truly effective leaders than I see peoplestuck in positions of leadership who are sadly incompetent and seriously misguided about their ownabilities...
...you'd sometimes think that everyone has the potential to be an effective leader...
...is the most effective use of precious institutional dollars...
...it is necessary to work out effective principles for the development of sustainable and recyclable campus...
...Do you think what you do for relaxation is an effective way to beat stress...
...I generally find out what I do is effective for me...

synos.tran: [数]有效的，起作用的；实际的，实在的；给人深刻印象

phrases.pCn: 有成本效益的；划算的；成本效率

remMethod.val: 来自effect(n. 影响， 效果)

words.tran: 有效地，生效地；有力地；实际上
[生理] 效应器；[遗] 效应物；操纵装置

trans.tranOther: successful, and working in the way that was intended
